name: Lucha Reyes
description: '''Lucila Justina Sarsines Reyes''' (July 19, 1936 – October 31, 1973), was a Peruvian [[performer]] and one of the most respected singers of her country, one of Peru's most famous [[African-Peruvian]] personalities as well as a symbol of Peruvian [[nationalism]] both in [[Peru]] and to expatriates. She was also known by the pseudonyms "La Morena de Oro del Per√∫", given to her by Augusto Ferrando, and "La Reina de la Popularidad". She is well known for her voice and her music has gone through history as some of the best in the history of Peruvian music.
